类的使用
HttpRequest

    • <Unnamed>中HttpRequest的使用

      返回HttpRequest的<Unnamed>中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.body(String data)
      Submit data.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.bodyForm(HttpRequest.Form form)
      Submit form data.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.execute()
      Execute the request.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.execute(int timeout)
      Execute the request.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.expectResponseCode(int... codes)
      Require that the response code is one of the given response codes.
      static HttpRequest HttpRequest.get(URL url)
      Perform a GET request.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.header(String key, String value)
      Add a header.
      static HttpRequest HttpRequest.post(URL url)
      Perform a POST request.
      static HttpRequest HttpRequest.request(String method, URL url)
      Perform a request.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.saveContent(File file)
      Save the result to a file.
      HttpRequest HttpRequest.saveContent(OutputStream out)
      Save the result to an output stream.
